meanings.definition: The act of writing or drawing with a pencil.
meanings.sent1: Her pencillings on the paper were neat and precise.
meanings.sent2: I found some pencillings on the desk from yesterday's class.
meanings.sent3: The cat left tiny pencillings on the floor with its playful paws.
meanings.sent4: His pencillings of emotions on the canvas spoke volumes without words.
meanings.sent5: The pencillings in the notebook brought the story to life.

meanings.sent1: The pencillings on the wall were easily erased.
meanings.sent2: She noticed some pencillings on the margins of the book.
meanings.sent3: The pencillings on his face made him look like a clown.
meanings.sent4: The pencillings of light and shadow created a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The pencillings on the map guided us through the forest.

meanings.definition: A series of short written pieces.
meanings.sent1: Her pencillings in the magazine were always insightful.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed reading the pencillings in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The pencillings in the diary told a fascinating story.
meanings.sent4: His pencillings of humor brightened up the dull day.
meanings.sent5: The pencillings in the journal captured the essence of the trip.
